title: Eagle Eye

rules.text: Scout 3 path cards, then draw 1 path card.

flavor_text: When you were young, you and your father would climb the Mound of the Navigator and look over the Valley. From that high vantage, he taught you to see the subtlest movements and minute detail of the flora and fauna far below.

title: Paths We've Roamed Before

rules.text: Choose up to 4 total moments or attributes from any number of Ranger discards. Place the chosen cards facedown on the top of their Ranger's fatigue stack.

flavor_text: As you walk the Valley, you recall the wisdom gained during the seasonal wanderings of your youth.

title: Strider

rules.text: You can only commit this attribute when interacting with a trail.

flavor_text: From the day you took your first steps, you haven't stopped moving. Your heart yearns to scale distant peaks and wander untrodden vistas. You continually look toward the horizon, never content to sit still.

title: Trail Mix

rules.text: Exhaust (use 1 morsel): Choose a Ranger. That Ranger soothes fatigue equal to the number of FIT in their energy pool.

flavor_text: It's a delicious medley of cherry moss pemmican, marbled great beans, starpeas, almonds, and a few surprises.

rules.text: Play a moment from your discard pile without paying its energy cost (X is equal to the chosen moment's cost).
This card can be played at the time specified on the chosen moment.
When you equip this gear, attach a moment to it from your hand.
Exhaust (use 1 echo): Play the attached moment as if it were in your hand. It remains attached to this gear instead of being discarded.

title: Adaptable Multitool

rules.text: Exhaust (use 1 charge): Spend 1 energy to gain 1 energy of any type.

flavor_text: There's no better companion than a memlev multitool. It's like having an artificer's workshop in the palm of your hand, but not nearly as heavy.

title: Ironwool Boots

rules.text: Response: After you play a moment, soothe 1 fatigue.

flavor_text: Your mother taught you many things as you walked by her side, trekking across the Valley and back, but of all her teachings, none were more useful than this: always wear comfortable shoes.

title: Meditation Pillow

rules.text: FOC + [connection] (use 1 session): Meditate on your journey to shuffle a number of cards from your fatigue stack into your Ranger deck equal to your effort.

flavor_text: You feel that quiet meditation is essential to daily life, and that the ability to enjoy moments of stillness is paramount to one's well-being.
